description: INTRODUCTIONA mid-rise residential structure is Equiti Residence. There are a total of 14 stories with 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments, as well as numerous amenities for a healthy urban lifestyle, like a pool. These apartments in the Equiti Residence include huge living rooms that are connected to the dining space, as well as wide kitchens. Some homes feature two balconies, one connected to the living area and the other to the bedrooms, both of which offer stunning views of the neighborhood. Al Furjan, a family-friendly neighborhood near to Discovery Gardens, is made up of roomy homes and terraced houses with lots of outdoor space. Within Al Furjan, there are two community centers for residents to enjoy: Al Furjan Pavilion and Al Furjan West Pavilion. Both of these facilities offer a wealth of activities, including gyms, swimming pools, sports fields, and parks. The Walk in JBR is another well-known and distinctive shopping area. It is about a 15-minute drive from the Equiti Residence. Guru Nanak Darbar and Arabian Holidays are two additional well-known sites nearby, both of which are about ten minutes from this structure. The sophisticated interiors will be inspired by the natural colours and textures of the surrounding desert and will be executed in the 3 cool-neutral tone-on-tone palette of cream, champagne and bronze, as well as textures of wood, stone, glass and metal. Property Details:• 4 Bedroom townhouse• Unit price - 8,588,000 aed• Built up area - 5,307 sqftAmong the other key features of the exquisite Keturah Reserve townhouses are:• Roof deck with an outdoor pool• Terrace• Barbeque with seating• Storage• Double car park• Laundry area• Entertainment area• Balconies• Maid’s room• 2 kitchens: functional and entertainmentWhen residing in Keturah Reserve, you will be treated to an abundance of world-class amenities, which will aim to incorporate wellness in every aspect of your life. Among them are:• Expansive communal spaces• Outdoor pool• Women’s and men’s gyms• Restaurants• Healthcare facilities• Water bike pool• Silk rope classes• Rooftop meditation and yoga spaces• 18+ roof pool• Family and children’s pool• Ladies’ pool• Sauna• Family lounges• Cinema• Nursery• Running tracks• Kiosks• Juice bars• Co-working stations• Gaming & VR areas• Children’s park• Sports facilities: cross fit, tennis football, swimming, basketball, handball, squash, martial arts, padel tennis, gymnastics, shooting and fencingAt the same time, within a 15-minute drive, the following entertainment venues can be found:• Meydan Bridge• The Track, Meydan Golf• Deep Dive Dubai• Meydan Racecourse• Nad Al Sheba ParkTennis 360 MeydanKeturah Reserve will be designed by the renowned architect; Charles Wu, who had been involved in numerous high-profile residential and commercial projects in the UK, Asia and in the United States. Offering transformational living, the uber-luxe homes will be angled to allow and maximize natural daylight, whilst the double-volume interior spaces will increase the flow of naturally cooled air, which makes air conditioning unnecessary. At the same time, the open-plan spaces will be designed without any hallways or corridors and will feature custom-designed furniture and fixtures to optimize the flow of passage. description: Description Urban Terrace Real Estate L. L. C. is pleased to bring you this tastefully furnished pool facing one bedroom apartment in The Autograph, JVC. Their first development was a huge success with end-users and investors alike for its quality finishing, unique specs, and high ROI. Now coming up with another masterpiece in JVC THE AUTOGRAPH.  Features:-* Fully furnished. * Pool View. * Lovely kitchen fully fitted with Italian appliances and has a kitchen island. * Spacious Living Room. * Spacious balcony. * Powder room (guests bathroom). * Laundry Cabin. * Spacious master bedroom. * Walk-in closet. * Big master bedroom with Mobile Integrated Music system* Central AC (DEWA) with a Mobile activated ECO Friendly Temperature Control. * Central Gas (Lootah Gas)* One allocated parking space* 24/7 onsite security*Mobile Activated ECO Friendly Coffee Machine in the lobby* Temperature Controlled Swimming Pool. * High Tech Fitness Center. * BBQ Decks. * Open Air Glass Squash Court. Contact us now for more details and viewing arrangements. Hello, I worked in the real estate industry in Dubai, UAE, Saudi Arabia and India since 2010 when I found real estate business serving uptown Saudi and surrounding neighborhoods. Since I have born and brought up in Saudi I don't face any language barrier in Gulf as i speak Arabic, Hindi and Urdu. From day one, I have sought to provide the highest possible standards of service and a thorough, analytic approach to every transaction. With my well-rounded experience in all areas of the industry, I proud myself on bringing a more consultative approach for buyers and sellers. I have combined my dedication and well-experienced approach to making a giant footprint in the Urban Terrace Real Estate market. My strong business acumen allows me to build and maintain lifelong relationships which explain why my business is achieving tremendous growth. Kindly give me a chance to full fill all your real estate requirements by contacting me on View Contact Detail. Urban Terrace provides the most professional, informative, loyal and dedicated service in the industry since 5 years. The best interests of our clients will always come first and we will place the clients’ concerns ahead of our own in each and every transaction, as we are dedicated to the development of long-term client relationships ! Our team-approach philosophy ensures your needs are important to each and every member of our organization. Trade License: View Contact DetailRERA ORN: 21242DED# 807223, RERA# 21242

description: INTRODUCTIONA mid-rise residential structure is Equiti Residence. There are a total of 14 stories with 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments, as well as numerous amenities for a healthy urban lifestyle, like a pool. These apartments in the Equiti Residence include huge living rooms that are connected to the dining space, as well as wide kitchens. Some homes feature two balconies, one connected to the living area and the other to the bedrooms, both of which offer stunning views of the neighborhood. Al Furjan, a family-friendly neighborhood near to Discovery Gardens, is made up of roomy homes and terraced houses with lots of outdoor space. Within Al Furjan, there are two community centers for residents to enjoy: Al Furjan Pavilion and Al Furjan West Pavilion. Both of these facilities offer a wealth of activities, including gyms, swimming pools, sports fields, and parks. The Walk in JBR is another well-known and distinctive shopping area. It is about a 15-minute drive from the Equiti Residence. Guru Nanak Darbar and Arabian Holidays are two additional well-known sites nearby, both of which are about ten minutes from this structure. At the same time, the locality is filled with its leisure dose of recreational spaces, hotels, shopping malls and leisure facilities. These elegant townhouses are designed to meet the needs of residents and families seeking a high-end lifestyle within a resort-style community. Residents and their guests can have various modes of entertainment and leisure available at service, offering everything at the doorstep. title: Best Investment you get in Arjan Right Now| 8% ROI Guaranteed | Zero Service Charge for 3 Years | Multiple Payment Plan
description: MASTER COMMUNITYArjan is a planned multi-billion dollar development and housing project in Dubailand. The area includes a variety of commercial, retail, other hospitality and residential developments spread across 10 zones with a total of approximately 157 lots.This development offers a variety of property options available for both sale and rental.  Arjan, Dubailand has been developed by Dubai Holdings and has grown into a high standard residential and tourist destination. The development is also known for being environmentally friendly as it uses renewable energy to meet the energy needs of its residents. The close proximity to neighboring areas such as Dubai Hills Estate, Al Qudra Road and the famous Sheikh Bin Zayed Road has greatly increased the sale value of properties in Arjan. DEVELOPERThe Marquis is an aesthetic property aimed at the next generation of homeowners.  With exceptional amenities coupled with connectivity, this fantastic living space is a great property for homeowners looking to expand their horizons. The Marquis Signature is a one-of-a-kind luxury living room with all the luxury and sophistication.
